类 MesosFlinkResourceManager

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class MesosFlinkResourceManager
extends FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredMesosWorkerNode>
    Flink Resource Manager for Apache Mesos.

        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions during initialization cause the resource manager to fail. If the framework is able to recover this resource manager, it will be restarted.

      • fatalError

        protected void fatalError(java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.Throwable error)
        从类复制的说明: FlinkResourceManager
        Notifies the resource master of a fatal error.

        IMPORTANT: This should not cleanly shut down this master, but exit it in such a way that a high-availability setting would restart this or fail over to another master.

        指定者:
        fatalError 在类中 FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredMesosWorkerNode>

      • acceptOffers

        private void acceptOffers(AcceptOffers msg)
        Accept offers as advised by the launch coordinator.

        Acceptance is routed through the RM to update the persistent state before forwarding the message to Mesos.

        指定者:
        getNumWorkersPendingRegistration 在类中 FlinkResourceManager<RegisteredMesosWorkerNode>
        返回:

      • createActorProps

        public static akka.actor.Props createActorProps(java.lang.Class<? extends MesosFlinkResourceManager> actorClass,
                                                Configuration flinkConfig,
                                                MesosConfiguration mesosConfig,
                                                MesosWorkerStore workerStore,
                                                LeaderRetrievalService leaderRetrievalService,
                                                MesosTaskManagerParameters taskManagerParameters,
                                                ContainerSpecification taskManagerContainerSpec,
                                                MesosArtifactResolver artifactResolver,
                                                org.slf4j.Logger log)
        Creates the props needed to instantiate this actor.

        Rather than extracting and validating parameters in the constructor, this factory method takes care of that. That way, errors occur synchronously, and are not swallowed simply in a failed asynchronous attempt to start the actor.

        参数:
        actorClass - The actor class, to allow overriding this actor with subclasses for testing.
        flinkConfig - The Flink configuration object.
        taskManagerParameters - The parameters for launching TaskManager containers.
        taskManagerContainerSpec - The container specification.
        artifactResolver - The artifact resolver to locate artifacts
        log - The logger to log to.
        返回:
        The Props object to instantiate the MesosFlinkResourceManager actor.
